"Probeer vra: \"What's the Blue Bulls score?\" (Wat is die Blou Bulle se telling?)"
"Probeer vra: \"What's the Sharks score?\" (Wat is die Sharks se telling?)"
"Probeer vra: \"What's the Lions score?\" (Wat is die Lions se telling?)"
"Probeer vra: \"What's the Kaizer Chiefs score?\" (Wat is die Kaizer Chiefs se telling?)"
"Probeer vra: \"What's the weather in New York?\" (Hoe lyk die weer in New York?)"
"Probeer vra: \"What's the weather in San Francisco?\" (Hoe lyk die weer in San Francisco?)"
"Probeer vra: \"What's the weather in Paris?\" (Hoe lyk die weer in Parys?)"
"Probeer vra: \"What's the weather in Cozumel?\" (Hoe lyk die weer in Cozumel?)"
Probeer vra: \"How tall is Brad Pitt?\" (Hoe lank is Brad Pitt?)
Probeer vra: \"How hot is the sun?\" (Hoe warm is die son?)
Probeer vra: \"When was John Wayne born?\" (Wanneer is John Wayne gebore?)
Probeer: \"Open YouTube\" (Maak YouTube oop)
Probeer: \"Open Play Flieks\" (Maak Play Flieks oop)
